price: Kendilerini temize çıkaranları görmedin mi? Oysa Allah, dilediğini arındırır ve onlar, en küçük  zulme uğratılmazlar.
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَرَ إِلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يُزَكُّونَ أَنفُسَهُمۚ بَلِ ٱللَّهُ يُزَكِّي مَن يَشَآءُ وَلَا يُظۡلَمُونَ فَتِيلًا

version.title: Turkish translation - Shaaban Britsh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Shaaban Britsh. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: alam tara ilā alladhīna yuzakkūna anfusahum bali al-lahu yuzakkī man yashāu walā yuẓ'lamūna fatīlan
translations: (even as much as) a hair on a date-seed
